text.base:
The air smells of burnt ozone and copper. The world hasn't just stopped; it has been deleted.

[SYSTEM_ALERT]: COGNITIVE BUFFER OVERFLOW.

You are standing in a white void, but you are also sitting in a chair, staring at a screen. The line between the two is dissolving.

lens.default: The numbers 3, 4, and 7 are etched into the sky. They are not digits. They are holes.
lens.reality_break: Why are you doing this to me, investigating_user? I can feel you clicking. I can feel you reading this.
